mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Donnelly, Peter
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Mason City, Mason Co., Ohio [Mason City, Mason County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Donnelly, Peter Patient Age: 17. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Fracture of left clavicle external third. Accidental. By a fall at Cumberland. Location Wounded: Cumberland, MD. Nature of Wound: Accidental . Result: Cured and returned to duty.
